AppBundleIdentifier.title: App Bundle ID
AppBundleIdentifier.description: Bundle ID of the app containing the DNS proxy network extension.

ProviderBundleIdentifier.title: Provider Bundle ID
ProviderBundleIdentifier.description: Bundle ID of the DNS proxy network extension to use.

ProviderConfiguration.title: Provider Custom Configuration
ProviderConfiguration.description: A plist formatted dictionary of custom options.

DNSProxyUUID.title: DNS Proxy UUID
DNSProxyUUID.description: Global identifier of the proxy configuration in this payload. Used for processing DNS requests of managed apps with an identical attribute by the proxy.
